text: No Fear, No Blame () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Mitta.Юбилейный вечер Николая Бурляева прошел в театре им. ВахтанговаБЕЗ СТРАХА И УПРЕКА It stars Alla Vitruk, Viktor Glazkov, and Nikolay Burlyaev. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1962 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: No Fear, No Blame
